name: MacVide
overview:
Internet technologies are widely available nowadays and users face huge amount of images, audios and videos on web every day. Products presented on www.macvide.com opens up great opportunities for working with media files for users of Mac. These programs give you a possibility to convert video files into different formats, accept them for Mac tools and mobile phones, and make video and audio tutorials. To acquaint you with this software our site suggests overviews, screenshots and information about usage of the programs.

Since flash become very popular format there is necessity in having reliable video converter. Macvide FlashVideo Converter and Macvide VideoFlash Converter are excellent tools for modifying videos from Internet and your own video files into appropriate format.

Would like to watch your favorite movies and TV shows wherever it is convenient to you? On our website you can download useful converting tools for iPad and iPod. Beside conversion these applications allow users of Mac devices set bit rate, frame rate and video resolution of video files. There is also a solution for owners of mobile phones â€“ Macvide 3gp Converter that enables saving of files in 3gp format supported by most mobile devices. These converters have intuitive and comprehensive interface and provide wide variety of functions such as video crop and setting particular file size.

Using Internet you have probably treated with training videos that are widely spread on web nowadays. To create your own tutorial video use Macvide ScreenCap, the program that allows you to capture and record everything that happens on your desktop and save result files in different formats. This recording tool may also be used for monitoring. For sound recording www.macvide.com suggest Macvide Audio recorder, easy-to-use tool enabling recording from microphone or from any application. On our site you can also find fully functional Flash Player for watching your flash, SWF and FLV video files.

You can download trial version of any application presented on www.macvide.com to familiarize yourself with our products. Trial version has time and functional restrictions; to use fully-functional version of program purchase a license. You may find the answers to your questions concerning the usage of our programs in Support and Tutorial sections of our site.

Nowadays work with media files have become a commonplace for every Internet user. Macvide suggests users of Mac reliable software for conversion, recording and playing video and audio files. Combination of high quality and simplicity in use of our products meets the requirements of the most demanding users and makes these application very useful tools for everyday usage.
